titles.title: I've found a new way of living,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've found a new way of living,
I've found a life that's divine,
I've found a new way of living,
And it's abiding,
Abiding in the vine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Abiding in the vine,
Abiding in the vine,
Love, joy, peace, health,
Happiness is mine.
Now I have liberty, power and victory,
Abiding, abiding in the vine.
